on_boarding_title_1: The Latest Way to Invest in Real Estate
on_boarding_description_1: We provide you with modern ways to invest in real estate securely and authentically.
on_boarding_description_2: We offer you a comprehensive and seamless dashboard to track your investments and funds through the portfolio.
on_boarding_description_3: We issue seamless ownership certificates for all investors to invest in their properties.
auth_method_description: choose between secure login or quick registration to tailor your access.
all_done_description: We have sent you an email, check your inbox
have_no_products_description: Try adding some products and it will appear in this page from the plus icon below
our_terms: Welcome to the SSH Company Development application, where we provide you with a powerful tool aimed at facilitating development processes and improving performance within your company
reset_password_sub_text: Enter your phone number, and we will send a text message containing four digits of advice. Do not share this number with anyone.
confirm_code_sub_text: A four-digit code has been sent to your phone number via text message. Enter the code below.
begin_investing_sub_text: Your investing journey starts from here
begin_investing_step1: You will receive legal ownership documents from the platform
begin_investing_step2: You will get monthly rent returns
begin_investing_step3: All your assets will be preserved by time
view_investments_chances_sub_text: Browse now exclusive investment opportunities in real estate
investment_limit_sub_text: Start investing now to get higher
Invite_friends: Invite your friends and win now!!
Invite_friends_sub_text: Invite your friends and you will be rewarded to your balance to invest freely and safely
account_verification: Please verify your account to gain access to property details and make investments
your_job_sub_text: Tell us about your job to have a personalized experience in the application
your_address_sub_text: This adds to the security of the application and keeps you safe from any fraud individuals
name_of_work_place: The name of your work place
name_of_work_owner: What's the name of your work owner?
address_of_work: What's the address of your work place?
security_message: We care very much about the security of your account and add multiple layers of protection to develop our security and protection
investment_limit_reset: When will my investment limit be reset?
annual_investment_limit: Your annual investment limit will be restored on January 1, 2025
why_limit_applied: Why is the limit applied to my investment?
local_regulations: Local regulations limit individual investors to a maximum investment of 50,000 American dollars on the Seamless platform per calendar year.
how_to_become_professional_investor: How do I become a professional investor?
professional_investor_conditions: If you have assets worth more than one million dollars, you can contact us to be classified as a professional investor. Conditions mentioned above vary.
more_security_factors: It adds more security factors to your login process
rent_paid_notifications: Receive notifications when rent is paid or a new property is launched
email_notifications_properties: Receive notifications on your email for everything new in properties and special opportunities
receive_documents: When will I receive the documents?
investment_plan_sub_text: How much do you plan to invest in the next 12 months?
get_payment_faster: Get your payment faster and in cash when you complete the sale with Seamless
pay_price_in_cash: We pay the price of your property in cash
seamless_sell_property: Seamless allows you to easily sell your property for a full cash offer upon sale. Seamless is the ideal solution for you
perfect_closing_record: We have a perfect closing record and provide fair market value for the property without any hassle
list_property_seamless: Simply list your property on Seamless and get your money in cash when the sale is completed
upload_property_details: Upload your property details without any obligations and if we are interested we will make you an offer
take_care_of_updates: We will take care of any necessary updates and photograph the property in a professional manner for marketing purposes
property_listed_seamless: Your property will be listed on the Seamless platform and may usually sell within 30-45 days
sale_proceeds_transferred: The proceeds of the sale will be transferred to your bank account within 30 days of the property closing
why_sell_with_seamless: Why you should sell with Seamless?
sell_property_for_cash: Sell your property for cash. We have a 100% closing rate and are ready to offer you fair market value without any hassle.
timely_cash_offer: Timely cash offer and 100% closing rate.
competitive_offer_within_days: The majority of homes listed will receive a competitive offer within days
sell_property_whenever_you_want: Sell your property whenever you want
offer_within_days: We make an offer within days, but you must specify the sale date to ensure flexibility during the sales process
cover_evaluations_marketing: We cover evaluations, marketing, and all extensive studies. You don't have to deal with any inspections or repairs
tenants_can_stay: Tenants can stay in the house
sell_property_with_tenants: Sell your property even though you have tenants so you don't have to wait for any leases to expire and you will continue to receive your rental income while the property is financed.
ready_to_sell_property: Are you ready to sell your property?
thinking_of_selling: If you are thinking of selling, do not hesitate! The procedures are quick and non-binding
contact_us_msg: You can also contact us on
eligible_properties_listed: Eligible properties can be listed for sale in the 2nd week exit windows held every May and November
investing_requires_activation: Investing with us requires activating your identity or passport, residence address, and client details before starting the investment process
make_sure_to_display_details: Make sure to display all details including the lines at the bottom
no_photos_from_another_screen: We do not accept photos taken from another screen
no_photos_with_glare: We do not accept photos with glare or excessive exposure
no_cropped_or_damaged_images: We do not accept cropped or damaged images
invest_now_to_get_notified: Invest now to get notified about all your investments and your sold properties
explore_properties_and_mark_favorites: Explore properties and mark your favourite ones to find them here with easy access
protection_sub_text: Seamless guaranteed 1 year rent for this unit
current_rent_sub_text: This unit rent per month is
annual_gross_yield_sub_text: This unit based on our analysis will yield approximately
read_and_accept_terms_and_conditions: Read and Accept Terms and Conditions
property_funding_completion_date: This is the Property Funding Completion Date
special_purpose_company_formed: A Special Purpose Company has been formed and property deeds have been distributed
spv_creation_and_property_deeds_distribu: An SPV will be created, and all investors will receive their property deeds within 2-3 weeks of funding closure to prove their ownership of the property
expected_first_rent_payment_date: The first rent payment for this property is expected to be paid to investors by April 25, 2024
